title: Two Bedroom Townhome with Garage!
posting_body: ['For anyone who loves luxury and the outdoors, St. Tropez at Plantation Townhomes and Apartments are the best in the area!', 'No matter how you recreate in this sunny Florida location, you’ll always have something to keep you busy.', 'This luxury townhome community comes complete with a 10-acre fully stocked fishing lake, 2 swimming pools, a tiki bar, and 2 tennis courts.', 'There is no shortage of things to do when you live at St. Tropez.', 'And if you’re more inclined to relax inside you’ll find each townhome has its oversized patio for entertaining guests, screened balconies, spacious walk-in closets, and gourmet kitchens.', 'You will find everything you need when it comes to luxurious living at St. Tropez at Plantation Townhomes.', '-Tot-lot Recreation area', '-Three 24-Hour controlled access entrances with guest gated entry', '-Two elaborate pools', '-Two tennis courts', '-Ten acre stocked fishing lake and fishing dock', '-State-of-the-art fitness salon', '-Resident Club Room with Club room patio deck', '-Bbq area and Putting Green', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
